entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
